objects.text:
• Elegant Bronze-Finished Case
• Large Arabic Numerals Dial
• Dual Chronograph Subdials
• Traditional Wind-Up Crown

product_details.name: Vintage-Style Precision Chronograph Pocket Watch - Classic Bronze Timepiece
product_details.description:
• Elegant bronze-finished metal case with classic ring holder
• Large, easy-to-read Arabic numerals on cream-colored dial face
• Dual chronograph subdials for precise time measurement
• Traditional wind-up crown mechanism
• Intricate minute markers along the outer dial
• Sophisticated antique design perfect for collectors
• High-contrast hands for excellent visibility
• Durable metallic construction built to last
• Perfect blend of functionality and vintage aesthetics
• Ideal for vintage fashion enthusiasts and watch collectors

banner_details:
This banner design showcases a vintage-themed promotional layout for a pocket watch. It features a balanced split-color background with diagonally divided quadrants. The top-left and bottom-right are in soft beige tones, while the top-right and bottom-left corners incorporate deep brown hues. In the center-right, a realistic product image of a classic pocket watch is prominently displayed.

The text elements include: a bold serif **heading** near the top left, followed by a slightly smaller **subheading**, and a stylized **tagline** just below. Product details are listed in the **description** section using bullet points, accompanied by a bold **price**. A rounded rectangular button with the text **cta** (“Shop Now”) is placed at the bottom left on a light background. The background includes light circular and abstract vector graphics for depth and class.

**Color Palette**:
- Soft Beige: `#F2EDE4`
- Rich Brown: `#61493C`
- Light Taupe: `#DED5C6`
- Muted Coffee: `#7C5F4C`
- Accent Bronze: `#B19B82`
- Dark Mocha: `#4A352A`
product_color: The product image showcases a vintage stopwatch with a distinct antique aesthetic. The color palette includes warm, muted tones such as aged brass (#7C6A57), dark bronze (#4A3E36), off-white ivory (#F1E9D2), deep black (#1A1A1A) for the numbers, and subtle hints of oxidized red (#C14741) in the hand markers. These colors are blended smoothly, with metallic sheens and soft shadows enhancing the vintage feel. The background tone of the dial is a weathered beige, which contrasts effectively with the darker elements to highlight clarity and functionality. This harmonious blend provides a nostalgic yet premium feel, ideal for a classic timepiece advertisement.
